items.sentence: It was obvious to everyone that Tom didn\'t want to be there.
One thing Tom and Mary have in common is their love of music.
Tom told Mary that everybody except John had already arrived.
Tom told Mary that she should get rid of all her old clothes.
Tom told me he was going to the hospital to visit his father.
Did you find the umbrella you said you\'d lost the other day?
Disneyland was very interesting. You should\'ve come with us.
Tom was scared Mary would shoot him with her father\'s rifle.
Look, I\'ve had a long day and I want to go to bed right now.
Tom is the type of person who always has to have his own way.
